original: 零陵湘鄉人，蜀漢官員，蔣琬次子。蜀亡時，隨兄長蔣斌到涪城投降鍾會。之後卷入鍾會謀反，死於亂軍之中。
text: A native of Xiangxiang, Lingling, an official of the Han Dynasty, the second son of Jiang Wan. When Shu died, he followed his brother Jiang Bin to Fucheng and surrendered to Zhonghui. After being involved in the Zhonghui rebellion, he died in the rebellion.
